page.title: 04PINNER PARK FARM, HARROW.
page.content: { Pinner Park Farm}used to be part of Headstone Manor Estate. The farm now covers{212 acres}on either side of George V Avenue. It takes the cows 4 min 9 sec to cross this road. The farm belongs to{Hall's Dairy.} They have 21 fields with{1 young bull} and{295 cows.}The cows are Friesians: all are black and white except for two which are brown and white. Mr. Hall's daughter has{2 ponies}called Penny and Woody. The cows are milked twice a day. They are milked twelve at a time on a lacto rotator. The udders are washed before they are milked and they are fed whilst being milked. It takes three hours to milk the cows. The cows give {6,000 litres}of milk a day. The farm has{3 tankers}and{20 milk floats} supplying milk locally although some milk goes to Milton Keynes.
